article_title: Sales Adding Up For Accountants And Tax Preparers

article_metadata.author: Sageworks Stats

og.description: Accountants and tax preparers – already one of the top-performing types of U.S. businesses -- are tallying higher sales and profits  as more businesses and individuals seek help complying with requirements of the Affordable Care Act and other regulations. New data from Sageworks, a financial information company, show that sales for [...]
